title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2017/89 of 6 July 1989 derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 1726/70 as regards the time limits for concluding and registering cultivation contracts in respect of leaf tobacco
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2017/89
of 6 July 1989
derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 1726/70 as regards the time limits for concluding and registering cultivation contracts in respect of leaf tobacco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: By way of derogation from Article 2b of Regulation (EEC) No 1726/70, cultivation declarations and contracts in respect of leaf tobacco taking effect in 1989 may be concluded up to 31 July 1989 and registered up to 15 September 1989.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 June 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 94, 28. 4. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 129, 11. 5. 1989, p. 16.
(3) OJ No L 191, 27. 8. 1970, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 376, 31. 12. 1988, p. 34.
